授業目的: This course provides students with an opportunity to become acquainted with current social and cultural trends in China using up-to-date sources available from the internet.
到達目標: Students will gain a basic understanding of ongoing cultural and social trends in China today. They will also learn to see such trends comparatively in a global context.

トピック.授業計画1: Each class will consists of a mini lecture, group discussion, and individual presentations.
トピック.授業外学習2: Readings will be drawn from the internet. There will a short essay and a presentation for all students every week.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 授業外学修課題／Assignment, homework required outside class (06)
成績評価Grading2: プレゼンテーション・発表／Presentation (07)
成績評価Grading3: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
